summary: Comprehensive testing of Bonchef Mantenimiento CMMS completed successfully. Fixed critical CSS compilation error and verified full backend-frontend integration.
passed_tests: API health check - All endpoints responding
User registration with admin role - Working correctly
User login authentication - JWT tokens working
Department CRUD operations - Create, read, list working
Machine CRUD operations - Create, read, filter by department working
Work order creation - Both preventive and corrective types working
Work order status updates - Status changes tracked in history
File attachment upload - PNG/PDF upload working with base64 encoding
Dashboard statistics - Real-time stats from database working
Recent orders endpoint - Showing latest work orders
Calendar events endpoint - Scheduled orders appearing
Frontend login flow - Authentication and redirect working
Dashboard UI integration - All stat cards showing real backend data
Navigation between pages - All sidebar links working
Data synchronization - Frontend displaying backend test data correctly
Responsive design - Professional dark theme with orange branding
Role-based access - Admin user permissions working
Search and filter functionality - Work orders filtering working

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - Login, dashboard, navigation, and integration all working
success_percentage.integration: 100% - Backend data correctly displayed in frontend UI
